DOC.brief_title: AZD0914 Phase 1 ADME Study Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , single dose study 6 healthy male subject age 18 55 year . Each subject admit clinical pharmacology unit day prior dose Check ( Day -1 ) remain clinical pharmacology unit least target Day 8 ( 168 hour post-dose ) . All subject receive 3000 mg AZD0914 incorporate 18.5 MBq ( 500 Ci ) [ 14C ] administer single oral dose follow least 8 hour fast food . Subjects water . For specific food water restriction . This study investigate metabolic fate route excretion AZD0914 .
